name: survial
description:
This is a classic RPG game.

In the game, everyone can enjoy the excitement of adventure and the excitement of finding treasures.

There is a powerful monster deep in the game that you need to defeat in order to complete the game.

This is a world where danger and opportunity coexist, and you may encounter various monsters every distance you move. Be careful to ensure your survival. If you encounter a monster, be careful because the opponent is not kind and has strong attack power. Use your skills well, attack the enemy or use skills to heal yourself. In short, defeat the enemy before continuing forward. Of course, you can also choose to run away, but running away is not the ultimate solution. You will eventually face a large number of monsters!

Game gameplay

Control character movement through directional keys

Enter- Confirm
